description: colorful landscape with narrow, gnarled mountains in orange, blue, green, and gray; small round thatched hut LLQ with figure in window; rocks with gnarled trees lower half; many dots indicating distant foliage on mountains and blossoms on trees
inscription: URQ: 独酌 / 独酌花前酒 / 春風吹入懐 / 一閒吾願足 / 百事世相乖 / 白首人非舊 / 青山骨可埋 / 誰知今日楽 / 只在澹生涯 ] (Drinking alone, wine beside the  flowers, / Spring breezes fluttering the lapels of my robe. / With just this peace my desire is fulfilled, / while the world’s affairs leave me at odds. / White haired but not yet passed on,  / These green mountains a good place to take my bones. / Who understands that this happiness today / Lies simply in tranquillity of life?
